Attacks.Name: Psybeam
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Hex special condition.

Attacks.Name: Psychic
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is pushed away short range and loses 1 power.

Attacks.Name: Swift
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight and cover. If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is pushed away short range.

Superpowers.Name: Magic Bounce
Superpowers.Effect: When an enemy character targets Espeon with a superpower that gives a special condition, the effect is reflected back to the enemy character and Espeon remains unaffected.

Superpowers.Name: Future Sight
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 4. During its next activation, the chosen character has -2 dice on its first attack.

Attacks.Name: Stored Power
Attacks.Effect: This attack's strength increases by 1 for each power token on Espeon.
